body.summary: We have determined that this Parameter Change governance action is constitutional.
body.rationaleStatement:
Article II, Section 6.3 of the Cardano Constitution states ""Hard Fork Initiation" and "Parameter Update" actions shall undergo sufficient technical review and scrutiny as mandated by the Guardrails to ensure that the governance action does not endanger the security, functionality, performance, or long-term sustainability of the Cardano Blockchain."

The governance action with ID "gov_action1cgdsp7g0rr7wgqp7maptpvx525fxuqwfgm5qe3f5r20ew5x2772sq0m5y83" and title "Increase Transaction and Block Memory Units (Part 1 of 2)", as a Parameter Change governance action, has been "ratified by Intersect's Technical Steering Committee on 2025-10-01" following evaluation of its implications on the "security, functionality, performance, or long-term sustainability of the Cardano Blockchain".

The governance action also complies with the relevant guardrails in the Cardano Constitution.

We therefore find this governance action **Constitutional**.
body.conclusion: As a Parameter Change, this governance action has undergone sufficient technical review and complies with the relevant guardrails in the Cardano Constitution, so is deemed constitutional.
